structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.catch_line: Revocation Or Suspension Of License; Grounds; Surrender Of License; Effect

text.section: the licensee has violated any provision of this chapter or any rule or regulation lawfully made thereunder by the commissioner;

the existence of any fact or condition which, if it had existed at the time of the original application for such license, clearly would have warranted the commissioner in refusing to issue such license.
